name: There's Something in the Pipes
description:
You are the owner of a movie rental store.
You have one hour until your shift.
You need a shower.
The shower is full of blood.

Go figure.

A very serious plumbing simulator originally created for MAGS (November 2022). 

Honestly I'm not too sure if this counts as horror or comedy, but there's copious amounts of 1-bit blood and a bit of morbid humor so those are the tags we're going with.

Features:

  • A short (~15 - 20 minutes) character study with a bit of point-and-click puzzling.
  • Customizable screen tint so you don't burn your eyes out.
  • A pretty cool rubber duck.

(Note: the MAGS build of the game contains unintentional flickering effects during an opening cinematic. It can be skipped by pressing Escape when the titular pipes are on screen, or shutting your eyes until the alarm clock goes off. This issue is not present in the post-jam build.)
